text: Biswas pora Noah ke, ki nadikhe etu laga kotha khan janibole dise, Isor ke bhoi kori kene thaka nimite, tai laga ghor manu khan ke bachai lobole nimite pani laga jahaaj bona bole dise. Etu kori kene, tai prithibi ke ninda korise aru dharmikta laga uttoradhikari hoise, biswas pora11.7 Gen. 6: 13-22; 7:1..
